title: Sidewall - Fragment, 1765–70
description: Details of an architectural design printed in black and white: a) portion of an arched opening, with spandrel to left, set with a rocaille cartouche;above, lower portion of draped human figure; b) short channelled column flanked at base by head and shoulders of women; across column, a floral swag; at top, apparent base of spandrel of "a".

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall - Fragment, 1765–70.
1765–70. Block-printed, distemper, oil. Gift of Paul F. Franco. 1938-50-1-a,b.
